title: Number of road deaths in Switzerland 2006 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of fatalities. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
Overall Number of fatalities has decreased over the Year.

Number of fatalities is roughly constant from 2006 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 384.0 was reported at Year 2007
The lowest Number of fatalities, of value 216.0 was reported at Year 2016
